title: Hydration Reminder
tip: Drink at least 8 glasses of water per day to keep your body hydrated and your mind clear.

title: Digital Detox Hour
tip: Take one hour away from all screens each evening to reduce eye strain and improve sleep quality.

title: Stretch Breaks
tip: Every 2 hours, take a 5-minute stretch break to prevent muscle stiffness and improve blood circulation.

title: Mindful Breathing
tip: Practice 3 minutes of deep breathing in the morning to center your mind and reduce anxiety.

title: Colorful Plate Rule
tip: Include at least three different colored fruits or vegetables in your meals for a variety of nutrients.

title: Sleep Schedule
tip: Try to go to bed and wake up at the same time every day to regulate your internal clock.

title: Gratitude Journaling
tip: Write down 3 things you're grateful for each night to cultivate positivity and reduce stress.

title: No Sugar Challenge
tip: Cut added sugars from your diet for one week to reset cravings and support weight loss.

title: Walking Meetings
tip: If possible, take work calls while walking to add steps and refresh your brain.

title: Sunlight Boost
tip: Spend at least 15 minutes in the morning sunlight to enhance your vitamin D levels and mood.
